thread.title: Key considerations in energy from waste addressed by industry experts at 8th annual congress
thread.title_full: Key considerations in energy from waste addressed by industry experts at 8th annual congress

title: Key considerations in energy from waste addressed by industry experts at 8th annual congress
text:
Key considerations in energy from waste addressed by industry experts at 8th annual congress Sep 14, 2015 
ENERGY FROM WASTE 2015 takes place on 7th & 8th December 2015 at the Holiday Inn Regents Park, London UK Some of the most senior industry experts in resource efficiency and waste management will gather this December to discuss the latest developments in Energy from Waste when SMi's 8th annual show returns to London.
